itunes:title: he's a 10, but... red flags & green flags w/ darian & britt
title: he's a 10, but... red flags & green flags w/ darian & britt
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
description:
ladies (& gentlemen) start your engines because the fun & gains podcast is in for a WILD ride this week! darian is back to read your submissions of "he's a 10, but...", the two also review your red flags & green flags in relationships. Charge up those headphones & bring us to the gym for what might go down as your most fun lift sesh yet.


Train with Britt Start Your 7 Day Free Trial Today!

Shop Gymshark Shop my favorite Gym Fits!
